page.title: 07FLORA AND FAUNA continued
page.content: white in the summer.Their nest is built in a tree and is called a{drey. {Insects and invertibrates.}Here is a list of all the small creatures we saw.Bees,wasps,worms,slugs,flies and butterflies. {The dandelion}is very common and grows almost any where.It flowers around about March to April and seeds in May.When it seeds young children blow it to count how many blows it takes to blow the seeds off.If it takes 4 they say it is 4 o'clock.The children call this a{dandelion clock.} {Water Forget_me_nots}grow in wet places like along river banks.They are pale blue with a tiny yellow eye in the middle. {Bluebells}are very common in woods. This plant is grown from a bulb and survives winter as a bulb.{ {
